author: Kali Venable
title: 21 Austin Restaurants With Easy Parking
text:
21 Austin Restaurants With Easy Parking All Feb 7, 2017, 2:00pm CST Parking garage in downtown Austin Kokoulina/Shutterstock, Inc. 
The only thing more stressful than slowing inching down I-35 or Mopac during rush hour (which seems to be every hour) is trying to find parking in Austin. To save time and hassle, Eater has put together a map of the best restaurants with free and plentiful parking . 
Rather than circling the block or risking the boot and hefty fines while hungry for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, mark these restaurants with parking lots, complimentary valets, and free access to parking garages with validation. There are even special deals, such as gratis pickups for Jeffrey's . 
For the purposes of this map, Eater focused on areas where parking isn't so easy to find: downtown, Clarksville, East Austin, and South Austin's South Congress, South Lamar, and South First. 
Looking for wider neighborhood dining options? Check out Eater's guides to downtown Austin and South Congress , as well as lunch-specific maps for downtown and East Side . 
Everything below is arranged by neighborhood. Is there an area with great parking options missing below? Let Eater know through the tipline , comments, or over on the forum . 1 Clay Pit Contemporary Indian Cuisine 
Lunch is made easy at this contemporary Indian joint, with a delicious daily lunch buffet and free parking. Customer parking includes 18 spots within the onsite lot, and plenty of additional free spots at the Attorney General garage. Neighborhood: Downtown
